title: Cant log in
body:
Stuck at loading screen happening too many whats going on?
 Hack attack?

replies.body: What do you mean stuck at loading screen?  What are you seeing exactly and are there errors?  Let me know.

Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

Thanks for the follow ups!  It sounds like you're having a network issue that's failing to reach both the game servers and authentication so you can't get in.  Your best bet is to go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection and network settings.  Hope it helps!
ive tried that and it still doesnt work i cant sign into the NA servers but i can in Oceania seems only my main account in NA is having the issues

Thanks for trying!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some lgos and attach it in your ticket for context.  We'll reply back asap!
im stuck at the authenticating screen and it never connects than says unknown error check help and support
